name: MEC Gateway Tights - Women's
description:
Move freely at the gym in these climbing tights. The fabric is woven instead of knit to resist abrasion better. Multiple drop-in pockets keep small items handy when you're at a hanging belay. Great for gym climbing, yoga or light hiking, these tights are your gateway to good times outside (or inside).Made of stretch woven nylon and spandex that's durable enough to stand up to the rigors of climbing and hiking.Wide yoga pants-style waistband is comfortable under a harness or hipbelt.Internal drawcord ensures they won't slip out of place.Drop-in stretch pockets on the hips and back of waistband give you space to store your phone, lip balm, keys and other small essentials.Gusseted crotch and stretchy fabric ensure plenty of room to move.7/8-style 25 in. inseam.

Body fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
